title: Nyghtborn
description: The truth is a powerful thing….are you ready?When Jessa Cates moves to Alaska she expects it to be the last stop on her never ending tour of Air Forces bases. She doesn’t expect Trek, a guy who makes her skin shimmer like the sun and has brothers who sneak out to howl at the moon. They say Jessa is one of them. She says they’re all one-step from crazy.Then Jessa is kidnapped by the Marken-ha, and in the span of a single Arctic night she must question everything she knows to be true as she finds herself at the center of a war fought in shadow. Forced to choose, she can either believe Trek and embrace this new destiny standing with the Nyghtborn. Or she can become a pawn in a conflict clashing at the brink of fantasy and reality.
author: Aspen Lee
